full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BRJOD CING, THAL MO RDAG BLUD RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA GNOD PA PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, ,BZLOG PAS MTSAMS GCOD CING, @004B RJES CHO GA DKYUS BZHIN BYED, THABS DANG RTEN 'BREL BA LA BRTEN PA'I, ,GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUD SBYIN 'DI, ,GOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, RANG I NYER 'KHOR SLOB BU NI, BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PA'I, ,BSKUL BA'I 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJES YIS, ,THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON MED SRER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS, ,LEGS BSHAD BCOS CHUNG 'DI BSGRIGS PA'I, DGE BAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,BLO BUR RKYEN DANG 'BRAL GYUR CIG , ,,'DI LA MKHA' RNAMS THUGS 'KHRI LA, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
